Assessment IPCC report). Conversion factors for fuels shall be made transparent and
applied in a consistent manner;
(d) ensure all quantitative energy-related information is reported as final energy
consumption, referring to the amount of energy the undertaking actually consumes
using for example the table in Annex IV of Directive 2012/27 of the European
